Negative_Review: Too cold can not control temperature They are using plastic cups instead glass
Positive_Review: Good quality room and shuttle bus Very nice and kind staffs Good location to use airport

Negative_Review: The hairdryer didn t work but I only found out when I needed to use it on the morning of departure
Positive_Review: The hotel is very close to Linate airport and the journey to from the airport only took about 10 minutes although it should be noted that there was no traffic at the times I was travelling The shuttle service is free but you need to phone the hotel when you have collected your bags at the airport to let them know you are waiting Note that the shuttle is not a 24 hour service the times are given on booking com s website The room was clean and comfortable and quite spacious with tea coffee making facilities I would recommend this hotel to travellers who need to make an overnight stop near Linate airport but not for those who plan to stay in Milan to see the city s sights as it s a bit too far from the centre for that

Negative_Review: To visit Milan centre takes a while There is a tram but it doesn t run late At night going back to the hotel after diner or clubbing you will have to take a taxi Taxi s are relatively expensive
Positive_Review: The breakfast was exstensive Friendly personel

Negative_Review: Well cannot think of anything
Positive_Review: For my next day early flight this hotel made my life easy Very nice at all levels spend some sunshine time in the nice park next to the pool Very calm with a little bar and sunbeds around Reception area with bar and next to it a nice restaurant overlooking the pool and park Very comfortable beds and efficient rooms with all up to date equipment for biz activities

Negative_Review: The restaurant was very expensive but to be expected in a high quality hotel like this I suppose
Positive_Review: The Novotel was so clean and well organised had everything we needed and more would highly recommend it to anyone looking for a relaxing comfortable stay near milan

Negative_Review: The place is almost out of the city From Novotel to the dom for example 40 minutes by tram or 30 euro cab ride Not very clean
Positive_Review: The staff is very nice and helpful good breakfast

Negative_Review: Nothing
Positive_Review: It is a super modern hotel Very clean beautiful bedroom very comfortable bed and with the biggest TV I ve ever had on my hotel room Wifi is also strong until the room I arrive almost at 11pm but I still manage to get free shuttle from Linate the staffs very helpful and fast response when I asked about this service through mail So it s very convenient I wish I could stay longer and have a better weather to enjoy the swimming pool Oh they have a nice breakfast too plenty of choices

Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: The staff was extra helpful We left items at in our rental car and they called Avis for us to arrange pickup They were very kind and helpful Beautiful Hotel Great food Real Coffee cups and coffee from an urn

Negative_Review: no one speak good english Before our holidays i send emails for informations nobody reply to my emails The pool was close to clean One the last day we swimm We arrive to bergamo airport and we book this hotel for the pool When we arrived we dissapointed
Positive_Review: Amazjng garden amazing breakfast

Negative_Review: Location is far from the centre and nearest metro is 30 mins away by foot Tram is close by but very slow to get into town
Positive_Review: Stylish and modern rooms with a good shuttle to and from the airport

Negative_Review: I had no complaints with regard to the hotel It is an excellent choice if you need to be near the Linate Airport
Positive_Review: I had dinner at the hotel s restaurant It was excellent Probably the best meal I had in Italy

Negative_Review: They did not help prepare any kind of breakfast for our early check out before normal service times so paid for a breakfast included but didn t get anything
Positive_Review: Lovely swimming pool Staff were very friendly and helpful Beds were super comfy as were the pillows Shower had great water pressure Less than ten minutes to the airport but don t hear the sounds

Negative_Review: There is nothing I didn t like
Positive_Review: The room was beautiful I was on the top floor and it was wonderful The bed was so comfortable that I had the best sleep ever The staff were so friendly and helpful The hotel has a lovely welcoming atmosphere and the breakfast was AMAZING I will definitely be back again THANK YOU

Negative_Review: The hotel lobby and dining room was too cold in temperature during my entire visit I also didn t like that the dining room moved to an auxiliary room on some nights due to convention groups being at the hotel This made me feel less valued than other guests You should have more than 1 person assisting in the check in process This made a poor impression on me There was no apology for the delay and the check in person said nothing about the amenities of the hotel I had to ask questions and she seemed impatient Finally my luggage had been lost by the airline I informed the hotel reception that the airline found my bag and would deliver it to the hotel Since all of my clothes were in the list luggage I implored the hotel representative to contact me when it arrived as I was desperate to change my clothes I was told the hotel would follow through I kept checking throughout the day and night and the hotel said they didn t have my bag I checked with the airline and they indicated that the bag had been delivered to the hotel some time ago I went to the reception to inquire again and at first they said it hadn t arrived I asked if they could check again and they found it None of the fine hotels I have visited throughout the world would treat guests in this manner I am very disappointed with Novotel
Positive_Review: The proximity of the hotel to Linate Airport the process of ordering a taxi the housekeepers and dining room staff were very welcoming

Negative_Review: The staff at check in was efficient but not friendly very brash The eggs at breakfast were very runny too runny And the room carpet did not look or feel clean
Positive_Review: The bed was very comfortable Breakfast included in the room cost and started early enough to have before my departure flight

Negative_Review: I had an issue with the date I had done the booking The staff Martina was not nice to help me and encouraged me to book again out of booking site lying it was a better price and it was going to take at least 1 hour less I booked via booking of course with a better fare but she made me wait in the longe for a while to give me the room
Positive_Review: The hotel is ok for the price

Negative_Review: Room temperature is not good very warm and not adjusted Location is far from city Wifi not good interrupts always
Positive_Review: Cleanness and staff professionality

Negative_Review: parking not free would have liked more gluten free choice less industrial products more fruit fresh bread cereals
Positive_Review: comfortable room good location not noisy

Negative_Review: Close to Linate Airport but a little far from the center The Tram is just outside though but it takes about 20 minutes to the center
Positive_Review: Great arranged child friendly lobby nice staff all together Good restaurant

Negative_Review: The food at breakfast was very limited in respect to what we would have expected uk travellers But tasty none the less maybe could do with some more hot food options and more fruit
Positive_Review: The location was perfect for the event that we were attending concert at fabrique 5 minute walk and the free airport shuttle bus was excellent very tidy and comfy rooms and couldn t fault the helpfulness of the staff

Negative_Review: Room was not very clean Huge stain on the carpet Hallway smelled moldy Extremely rude restaurant staff member I had just walked off stage the night before in Rome and ran for the train in the morning So no dinner and no breakfast When I arrived at the hotel at 3 pm the restaurant had been closed for 30 minutes All the bar could offer was sandwiches and I was dying for some sort of a hearty pasta meal The front desk staff arranged for me to have a little bit of lasagna and bread I sat in the restaurant and the man who worked at the restaurant seemed pissed that I was there and was extremely rude I thanked him profusely It s not like he had to stay past his shift The front desk took pity on a starving opera singer and he was rude I was willing to eat ANYTHING he had in the kitchen
Positive_Review: Amazing front desk staff

Negative_Review: Could have had actual tea cups for the coffee making facilities rather than plastic ones so we could have another cup Also really basic could use some art on the walls
Positive_Review: Very basic but nice for a quick stay if you need to get to other transport quickly but wouldnt stay here if just for a holiday Breakfast was extra but had most options I ve seen at a breakfast buffet so worth it

Negative_Review: Fruit of the can in the morning industrial scrumbled eggs Room furniture the matress too soft stains in carpet dirty curtains screw holes in the walls
Positive_Review: I like the lounge area furniture and open bright day light The staff is very very friendly no matter who i got in contact with

Negative_Review: Too few staffs to service for amenities Sometimes the reception forgets to inform the housekeeping to send the amenities to the room Or the staffs are too busy to serve the clients
Positive_Review: Easy access to Linate airport and not too far from the city center

Negative_Review: The shuttle bus was hard to get on our way to the hotel from the airport some of the staff didn t speak english which made communicating a bit hard
Positive_Review: The bed was comfortable the facilities were good and friendly staff

Negative_Review: You have to call the airport shuttle else they do not come Reception has 3 different desks but when you are the 2nd person waiting they only help on 1 desk and this can take a long time depending on the questions of the guest in front of you
Positive_Review: Breakfast and dinner are great Staff restaurant is super friendly When you call the airport shuttle they arrive within 15 minutes

Negative_Review: nothing we didn t like
Positive_Review: hotel s contemporary style nice bedroom facilities excellent TV programmes in English great internet connection free shuttle between hotel airport

Negative_Review: The shuttle to the airport runs from 6am not so great if you have an early flight Taxi cost 20 euros
Positive_Review: Very clean spacious rooms large bar and restaurant area child friendly and had a modern feel

Negative_Review: Fire Alarm which was a test and the hotel did not inform us before and it made us feel panic and confused we leaved our room scarily when the alarm started and then we asked the staff what is going on they just said it was a test and they put information on the Check in desk which we did not see it before and we did not know every they we have to go in checking desk to get info like this Also The staffs were not friendly and helpful The room was hot and it was not possible to change the temperature because of old system which the staff told us and there were no air conditioner they told us it works only in summer The location was not good because for reaching the city centre we have to take a train which last at least 40 minutes long and the train plan was also not regular which is not the fault of Hotel and in this case we had to pay more attention to the distance
Positive_Review: Free shuttle Bus

Negative_Review: a Unfriendly staff b Paying an additional 100 euro than agreed upon at the reception c They clearly do not like you to book through booking com d We stayed here two nights The first time we were promised two beds with connecting doors for a set price This was not carried out e Tourist tax rated was 40 euro for two people in stead of 5 euro f Rooms felt like a prison g Long waiting time on the shuttle bus No taxi wanted to bring us there This was the last Novotel for us
Positive_Review: The departure

Negative_Review: Nothing not to like considering my time spent at the hotel
Positive_Review: Room was modern and up to date bed was comfy facilities and food was excellent The staff was very welcoming

Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: The hotel is extremely close to the concert venue Fabrique so it was very convenient when my friends and I saw The Chainsmokers there The buffet was delicious the hang out area in the lobby is fabulous and the staff is marvelous

Negative_Review: All the bugs crawling all over our beds and the rude staff who probably only treated my friends and I so poorly because we were American
Positive_Review: The bed was kind of comfy and the breakfast was okay

Negative_Review: The bar and restaurant is overpriced 20 for a small bland and dry hamburger I would give the restaurant a miss The check in was so efficient I did not dare to ask any questions
Positive_Review: The hotel is convenient close to the airport with the shuttle service running regularly The room was spacious and good value for money

Negative_Review: The shower water sprayed around Walls in the room were dirty a picture was removed at the wall and the heavy dust frame and holes still visible Curtain dirty
Positive_Review: Very kind staff at reception and in the bar and restaurant Convenient to airport Coffee available in the morning at 5am Furniture in bar restaurant Lounge space by the pool was nice

Negative_Review: Indicisive and poor advice from counter staff Being rushed out of my room by the cleaning regime Food and lint particles being left in the coridoor outside our room Bland repetitive breakfast menu Smoking contaminated lifts as non smoking rules not enforced
Positive_Review: Access to Milan airport and the Autostrade

Negative_Review: Not sure if I just didn t know how the A C works but it was really cold in my room and I couldn t do much about it
Positive_Review: As expected it was a good stay in this hotel Can t remember when was the last time I slept so well The bed was so comfortable I wanted to pass all my plans and stay in it for the rest of the day

Negative_Review: Carpet in the room was a bit grotty and the room was a bit utilitarian The room s internal doors didn t quite shut properly within their frames An iron would have been helpful
Positive_Review: Comfy bed and a very clean bathroom Very friendly staff

Negative_Review: Maiden entered rooms without knocking we where disturbed by their noise in the corridor during the full 3 days
Positive_Review: Breakfast buffet was good internet was working correctly as well

Negative_Review: Nothing
Positive_Review: Lovely Hotel Bed was very comfortable Rooms were clean near the airport good breakfast easy parking very friendly and helpful near tram stop to get into Milan it takes about 30 mins Good value for money We would stay again

Negative_Review: There was a malfunction in the washbain stuck wick immediately reported to the staff but not solved Staff was not always present at the reception desk e g at night I could enter the facility without being noticed by anybody except the cameras
Positive_Review: Comfortable bed and room Clean Fitness Area

Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: Very modern hotel close to Linate Airport Hotel has a free shuttle bus from to airport during the day we phoned them and they picked us up as promised within 10 minutes Pool and garden which were a pleasant surprise in this airport hotel

Negative_Review: Location not as convenient to tourist venues but access to trams and buses were right across the street
Positive_Review: Beds were very comfortable and air conditioning worked almost too well Food was great Staff was helpful prefessional and quick to respond Location was convenient to Linate airport and offices we visited for work Overall great business hotel

Negative_Review: The wi fi did not work for our entire stay 3 days and swimming pool didn t work for 1 day The hotel in general doesn t look like 4 stars hotel and the services provided does not match the number of stars as well
Positive_Review: The staff was quite nice

Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: We stayed in this hotel the night before an early department flight from Milan The hotel is excellent and the service from the hotel staff is undoubedly the best we have ever received A courtesy shuttle bus is provided to transfer you from the hotel to the airport and runs every 20mins I would highly recommend this hotel to anyone considering booking it with a 10 10 rating for service facilities and location to airport

Negative_Review: Very expensive bar and food No wifi available when we stayed Pool not in use on day we stayed Expensive parking Rude member of staff at reception when we were settling our bill
Positive_Review: Relatively easy to find Food was reasonable i

Negative_Review: A la carte menu and drinks very expensive even for a hotel captive market there are no alternative options for drinks dinner
Positive_Review: Beds very comfortable excellent breakfast buffet if included in the rate fun activities for children

Negative_Review: 1 Pillows on the bed were too hard 2 Had to order a cappuccino at breakfast coz the coffee in the buffet thermos was terrible
Positive_Review: 1 Very easy to find 2 Family room 126 was clean comfortable a good size 3 Good choice of tv stations in various languages 4 Only 5 mins from Linate on free shuttle bus 5 Very friendly approachable staff

Negative_Review: Location cleanliness staff were not helpful at all small pool freezing cold water nothing to do for young children
Positive_Review: The Sofa beds were good size and comfy

Negative_Review: Nothing It has everything that you could wish for
Positive_Review: The location of the property is very convenient Everything about the place right from the reception check in to check out was superb The hotel is very child friendly with lots of activities for kids of all ages It also has a garden area and swimming pool which gives the kids plenty of open spaces to run around and have a relaxing swim after a tiring day The rooms are spacious enough to accommodate a small family of 02 adults 02 young children and the beds are very comfortable which allows you to relax after a long flight and prepares you for the next days adventures The staff were very accommodating and friendly which made you feel that you are in your home away from home

Negative_Review: The Wifi was not good enough to receive data Also its ideal that a tram to downtown stops in front of the hotel However its not possible to buy tickets in the hotel
Positive_Review: The hotel is perfect for a few nights stay when you are on the move Its good value for money The location of the hotel and shuttle to Linate is very convenient

Negative_Review: Staff could be more courteous a bit surprised considering Italians are usually quite friendly Location was also far from city
Positive_Review: The hotel was standard Novotel which is good and we know what to expect especially when traveling with children

Negative_Review: Cups in bedroom were paper only good for one hot drink Having to pay for parking and water in room The driver of the airport shuttle could have been friendlier
Positive_Review: Excellent breakfast pool was a treat and good location for trams and airport shuttle service was prompt

Negative_Review: Nothing not to like we will be back
Positive_Review: Very pleasantly surprised with the Novotel The design of the rooms and public areas were fantastic and the added bonus of pool and lovely restaurant was very much appreciated Staff were very friendly and helpful Shuttle bus to the airport was useful We booked for the last night of our holiday before flight home but wish we were staying longer

Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: Perfect stop over location with a lot of facilities like airport shuttle on demand swimming pool with extended equipped garden restaurant and bar with small dishes available room service free WiFi working perfectly professional and friendly helpful staff

Negative_Review: The service in the restaurant was poor and the food was expensive and very bland on an evening That said staff at breakfast were friendly and breakfast was above average Garden area was ant infested you could be eaten alive
Positive_Review: It was clean and cool inside Reception staff were polite and helpful

Negative_Review: Not much choices in the daily menu for dinner Water in the swimming pool quite chill When we booked with booking com we mentioned that we accompanied with two children but according to hotel they diddn t see it in the system So you actually should write that into the remarks
Positive_Review: Staffs are friendly Breakfast was good You can dine in the hotel for very reasonable price You can park your car outside the hotel for free as well Save 15 euro day

Negative_Review: They really need more staff Checking in and out was slow Restaurant and bar was slow getting to order
Positive_Review: This is a wonderful hotel before you leave for a flight home The swimming pool was great for the grandchildren Shuttle service was so convenient

Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: Were there for only one night cause needed a hotel close to airport Linate So we didn t really get a full picture of the hotel Free airport shuttle A bonus was the possibility to go to Milan city centre by tram 27 for only 1 50 person direction It takes about 20 30 min and the tram holds close to the hotel

Negative_Review: The airport shuttle was a little troubling but in the end worked out fine Room is very basic cannot expect much For the price you pay I was disappointed Hotel personnel is quite cold and doesn t care much for you
Positive_Review: First floor of the Hotel is very nicely designed breakfast was very good with a nice variety

Negative_Review: Restaurant staff not as helpful for our evening meal Seemed displeased with what we ordered
Positive_Review: Lovely hotel light and airy Fitted our needs perfectly with swimming pool as a nice extra Enjoyed relaxing prior to flight home the next day Reception staff very friendly and helpful

Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: A great location due to its proximity to Linate Airport Stayed here a few years ago and it has been nicely refurbished since Pleasant and clean rooms

Negative_Review: Pity for the limited pet friendly policy only small dogs are welcome at breakfast 10 euros extra charge per day does not make 6legged travellers wagging their tails considering that no extra service is given for that
Positive_Review: Perfect location for those who are flying from to Linate Airport or working at Novegro Exhibition Center The hotel is brand new good design services and breakfast The bed is super confortable and the room very clean

Negative_Review: Little to do locally outside hotel Basic room with a few ants seen in the bathroom
Positive_Review: Free airport shuttle bus really close to airport friendly staff Nice interior to communal areas and good menu choices Kids enjoy the pool and outdoor space

Negative_Review: English speaking person when contacted for an airport pickup could have been more friendly and helpful in describing where to meet the van for the pickup She was very short and difficult to understand through all the airport noise
Positive_Review: Great location close to Linate airport with free shuttle

Negative_Review: The room was big but the carpet was awful The shower didn t get very hot which wasn t pleasant
Positive_Review: I liked the staff the breakfast the lounge hall area The bed was very comfortable

Negative_Review: Pool was dirty and was not a good sight near restaurant Would have liked a gift shop since there is no shopping close by
Positive_Review: Food was excellent Location close to airport Shuttle bus at no charge

Negative_Review: Even though there weren t many people in the bar area in the evening the service was quite slow
Positive_Review: Friendly staff good breakfast free minibus to Linate airport and only a tram ride to central Milan 1 50

Negative_Review: The interior of the rooms and hallways could use a upgrade Had a room that was clearly smoked in Didn t know that was still allowed
Positive_Review: Close to the airport reasonable rate for Sunday night

Negative_Review: smell in the area is terrible difficult to find hotel entrance when coming out of tangenziale you see the hotel but not easy to find entrance hotel staff not really friendly
Positive_Review: convenient only if you have an early flight from linate

Negative_Review: It was still a 20 Euro taxi to the airport for that early pre shuttle flight Carpet and some soft furnishings have seen better days but didn t feel dirty
Positive_Review: Staff very friendly helpful and professional Tea facilities in the room hooray Room a good size and style with everything one might want clean comfortable

Negative_Review: Our twin room was very warm eben though the heating was off
Positive_Review: Staff could not have been more helpful Even though we d checked out they were happy to store our luggage while we explored Milan and sorted our transfer to the airport Great service Located close to tram for easy and cheap access to Milan centre

Negative_Review: I ordered a sandwich at the bar and one minute later was served an inedible item a sandwich on stale bread with soggy wilted lettuce and tomato and one thin slice of something The waiter told me it had been pre prepared and was left over from the day before I neither ate nor paid for it
Positive_Review: A comfortable place to spend the night before an early morning flight from Milan Linate but not really a four star hotel

Negative_Review: There were insects in the room and the heating went off during the night leaving me with a cold
Positive_Review: Excellent breakfast buffet very handy for tram 27 to the city centre very comfortable room

Negative_Review: See item before
Positive_Review: Breakfast and bed were good but they stop the shuttle service from the airport at 11 pm and that is I think the main reason for anybody to want to stay at that hotel

Negative_Review: 1 Can do a bit more with cleanliness dusty elevator corners and toilet bowls etc 2 We have been to several Novotel hotels both in Switzerland and in France the meals variety and availability does not compare
Positive_Review: Good value for money Very ideal for family with kids Good location Internet connection lounge and bar very good Breakfast and meals buffet reasonable Very nice kind and helpful staff

Negative_Review: food and resturant staff there was no change of menu for the whole week resturant staff were not helpful reception poor reception with one staff serving all the guests one of the receptionist was rude no answering of room calls
Positive_Review: clean and good internet

Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: Location very close to Linate airport Staff very helpful and polite Shuttle bus Free of charge and punctual only 10min from the airport Restaurant convinient food with wide variety athough somewhat expensive Breakfast very complete

Negative_Review: rather unhelpful front desk staff who looked down on us and were unhelpful to us reference parking on the site we are obviously english and cant speak much italian

Negative_Review: restaurant in the evening been a catastrophe letting us wait until seeted letting us wait until served and food been not very tasty in the end seems like they diddnt wanted to have guests thats a blame for such a hotel
Positive_Review: barkeeper tried he s best been very attentive and friendly breakfast very good and very rich

Negative_Review: Nothing bad I travel a lot I am a strange and demanding traveller but still this hotel satisfied everything I expected

Negative_Review: Room was a delux but felt a little scruffy Very dark colour of the sofa wasn t particularly pleasing looked like my grandparents 70s furniture and the floor had burn marks all thought it was a non smoking room Oh and air con did not work
Positive_Review: Staff was exceptionally nice and helpful Shuttle service is very flexible too and everyone really does all they can to make your stay amazing and as comfortable as possible Breakfast buffet is small but great food and enough selection to get well filled up

Negative_Review: The cab to airport that hotel got for us charged us 22 euros Night before when we got our own cab from airport to hotel it cost 12 euros What is that all about
Positive_Review: Hotel was immaculate Staff was friendly and helpful Bar restaurant on site Coffee juice available at 4 a m Free shuttle altho our flight was too early to take advantage

Positive_Review: The staff was helpful and attentive The check in process was quick The lobby area of the hotel was nice and comfortable for waiting

Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: The staff were excellent and really helpful which did not surprise me as that has always been my previous experience on Novotel They gave me a free upgrade to Executive on arrival which was very welcome
